survey_name: Online Grocery Delivery Service Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with online grocery delivery services, including satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an 'Other' option for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online grocery delivery services?
answer_options: Access to a wider variety of products
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online grocery delivery services?
answer_options: Access to a wider variety of products

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall experience of using online grocery delivery services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall experience of using online grocery delivery services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What aspects of online grocery delivery services do you find most satisfying? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key satisfaction drivers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What aspects of online grocery delivery services do you find most satisfying? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What aspects of online grocery delivery services do you find least satisfying? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify pain points.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What aspects of online grocery delivery services do you find least satisfying? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend online grocery delivery services to a friend or family member? (1 = Not at all likely, 5 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend online grocery delivery services to a friend or family member? (1 = Not at all likely, 5 = Extremely likely)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Do you typically schedule deliveries in advance or opt for same-day/instant delivery?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand delivery preferences.

script.question_text: Do you typically schedule deliveries in advance or opt for same-day/instant delivery?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of organic or specialty products when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (1 = Not important at all, 5 = Extremely important)
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure importance of product variety.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with a 5-point scale.
